channel.title: Comments on: Free private Subversion hosting

item.title: By: Hang
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.description: Thanks Adam, looks good from the Web page. I will try out with another project later on.
item.content:encoded: Thanks Adam, looks good from the Web page. I will try out with another project later on.

item.title: By: Adam
item.dc:creator: Adam
item.description: Also, check out https://www.assembla.com/ for free subversion hosting. Free private repos with unlimited users and 1 GB: http://offers.assembla.com/free-subversion-hosting/
item.content:encoded: Also, check out https://www.assembla.com/ for free subversion hosting. Free private repos with unlimited users and 1 GB: http://offers.assembla.com/free-subversion-hosting/
